item.description:
Higher education is changing--and so isn't marketing! Fueled by a young customer base that's addicted to anything electronic, colleges need to compete fiercely for a fickle and hard-to-keep-track-of prospective student. Add to the mix...an exploding adult population returning to school. It makes for a complicated marketing strategy that demands knowing your customer, and, equally difficult, knowing their behavior. Kathy will give equal billing to successes and failures.

Kathy Wroblewski, Director of Marketing and Communications, Bay Path College
It's been almost 25 years since Kathy started in her first marketing position. Working in the fast-paced Boston computer industry, she eventually migrated westward (back to her roots!) and has been at Bay Path College for the last ten years.
item.name: May Breakfast Meeting- Should I go by my gut?
